title: Tekken (video game)
summary: Tekken (鉄拳) is a fighting video game developed and published by Namco. It was released in arcades in September 1994 and on the PlayStation in 1995. The game was well-received by critics, and it would serve as the first entry in the popular Tekken series, with a sequel, Tekken 2, being released in 1995.
